title: Off Grid-solar and wind set up

tasks.task: Watching and learning about an electric setup for a farm.
subtasks: Noting the location of the inverter.
Recognizing the wind turbine charge controller.
Understanding that the entire house is powered by the system.
Acknowledging the speaker's satisfaction with the product.
Noting the system's reliability without problems.
Acknowledging the system's current adequacy for needs.
